name: Bouncing Around (Naxo175_)
description:
Simple game made by me because I want to release a game before working on a more serious game. But anyways, hope you will enjoy this little game ! :)

Update Coming Soon !

I will add a leaderboard to let players get the best score and really play against other players, so be aware of a release ! (Also, if you have an idea of some textures and graphics for the game, you can tell me in the comments or join my Discord server)

Controls

↑ / Arrow Up : increase the bounce force by 100

↓ / Arrow Down : decrease the bounce force by 100

← / Arrow Left : move to the left

→ / Arrow Right : move to the right

It's as easy as pie !
